basics.name: Sam Poder
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a dedicated Grade 9 student at GEMS World Academy from Australia but living in Singapore, I'm passionate in Science, Technology and History. I enjoy programming, filmmaking and sport.

highlights: Developed Machine Learning Algorithms & Mobile Apps
Created App Idea to Improve Education For Less Fortunate
Presented at an Apple Educators Conference
Built a School Communication Platform for School
Managed Sound Effects on the Performance Day
Developed Debating & Writing Skills as well as Knowledge

Manila Global Round 2019: 13th Best Student (Gold Medal & Trophy), 7th Best Debater (Gold Medal & Trophy), 18th Best Team Overall (Gold Medal & Trophy), 9th Best Team in Debate (Gold Medal & Trophy), 7 Additional Gold Medals & 3 Additional Silver Medals
Singapore Regional Round 2019: 6th Best Individual in Debate (Gold Medal), 3rd Best Team in Debate (Gold Medal & Trophy), 13th Best Overall Team (Gold Medal) & 5 Additional Gold Medals
Consistently placed in the top 10 individually
Consistently placed in the top 3 teams
I have received three gold medals, four silvers and one bronze medal for sport
Participated in Football, Athletics Cricket & Rugby
I captained my cricket team to a gold medal and have also participated in cricket outside of school and won multiple trophies.
Have also played Australian Football Outside of School
Lead Technician for Cultural Day Assembly & Chinese New Year Assembly
Member of School's Delegation to Beyond COP 21 Symposium as well as participant in environmental action that would follow
Inspired Younger Children to Explore Digital Creativity

awards.title: Student of the Year
awards.summary: Chosen by the whole faculty and awarded to the student who best meets the following criteria: is consistently high achieving in their academic subjects, models the GEMS Core Values, models the IB Learner Profile Attributes, is perceived by all (Faculty and Students) to be a role model around school.

awards.title: G8 Best Student as Chosen By Teachers
awards.summary: Voted for being the student that was representing the GEMS Core Values and the IB Learner Profile characteristics in the best possible way.

awards.title: High Distinction Award
awards.summary: Applied critical thinking and problem-solving skills to science.

awards.title: G8 Best Science Fair Project
awards.awarder: GEMS World Academy Singapore Science Department
awards.summary: Created a device that detects falls in order to keep the elderly safe.

awards.title: Minor Prize Winner
awards.summary: Supported the Open Source Code Community.

awards.title: Gold Medal Winner & School Champion of Asian Rockstars of Math
awards.summary: Participated in math activities to explore areas of math I had yet to explore in school.

awards.title: Grand Champion
awards.summary: Started a business that helped improve the health of the elderly. View Cure Band Above.

awards.title: Technology Award
awards.summary: Recognized for specific efforts in the field of Technology.
